      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>b52f11cd-5c98-43f9-8936-54e1c58724ac#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Bethlen Gábor zászlaja (1615)</string>
            <string language="en">The flag of Gábor Bethlen (1615)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Markierungsfahne von Gábor Bethlen (1615)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'indicateur de Gábor Bethlen (1615)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A bandeira de Gábor Bethlen (1615)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La bandierina di Gábor Bethlen (1615)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η σημαία Gαbor Bethlen (1615)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El indicador de Gábor Bethlen (1615)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Arany lángnyelvekkel díszített címeres, feliratos, piros zászló</string>
            <string language="en">Armoired red flag with captions decorated with golden tounges of flame</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Bethlen fozászló fecskefarkas sarkantyú,  </string>
            <string language="en">Bethlen main colours sparrow-tailed spur</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Armoired rote Markierungsfahne mit den 
Untertitelen verziert mit goldenen tounges der Flamme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Indicateur rouge d'Armoired avec des légendes 
décorées des tounges d'or de la flamme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bandeira vermelha de Armoired com os subtítulos 
decorados com tounges dourados da flama</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bandierina rossa di Armoired con i titoli 
decorati con i tounges dorati della fiamma</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόκκινη σημαία Armoired με τους τίτλους που 
διακοσμούνται με τα χρυσά tounges της φλόγας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Indicador rojo de Armoired con los 
encabezamientos adornados con los tounges de oro de la llama</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bethlen Hauptfarben Spatz-angebundener Sporn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dent moineau-coupée la queue par couleurs principales 
de Bethlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dente reto pardal-sparrow-tailed de Bethlen cores 
principais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dente cilindrico sparrow-unito colori principali di 
Bethlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικό σπουργίτι-παρακολουθημένο χρώματα κέντρισμα 
Bethlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estímulo gorrio'n-atado colores principales de 
Bethlen</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
